scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n NEXT,ELECTRON -c blue,green "npm run dev -w terminal" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:3000 && electron --no-sandbox ."
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production concurrently -k -n NEXT,ELECTRON -c blue,green "npm run start -w terminal" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:3000 && electron --no-sandbox ."
